DOC.brief_summary: The combination testosterone dutasteride intend use hypogonadal men . This study evaluate bioavailability pharmacokinetics various dos testosterone administer without dutasteride
DOC.brief_title: Study On Bioavailability And Pharmacokinetics Of Various Doses Of Testosterone Administered With And Without Dutasteride
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Are healthy . Have BMI within range 1932 kg/m2 . Have take dutasteride one year , finasteride past 3 month . Have screen PSA < 2.0ng/mL . Exclusion criterion : Have breast prostate cancer , sleep apnea , psychiatric illness , clinically significant current condition . Have trigliceride level =500mg/dL . Have abnormal thyroid hormone level . Would donate 500 ML blood 2 month period . Physician think good idea participate trial . Are unwilling abstain alcohol study . Have positive urine drug screen test . Plan change smoke habit course trial . Have Hepatitis C , Hepatitis B , HIV . Have lab ECG abnormality . Have high low blood pressure . Have use investigational drug device study within 30 day prior 1st dose study medication .
